org.hibernate.search.spi

Interface ServiceProvider<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheManagerServiceProvider, HibernateSessionFactoryServiceProvider, JGroupsChannelProvider, MassIndexerFactoryProvider, MasterSelectorServiceProvider, SerializationProviderService, SerializerService

    public interface ServiceProvider<T>
    Control the life cycle of a service attached and used by Hibernate Search It allows to:
    • start the service
    • stop the service
    • declare the key the service is exposed to
    • provide access to the service
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard
